goal.description: A simplified classifieds app that aggregates and serves property & vehicle listings into a single mobile-first experience. The platform combines a robust backend aggregation and scraping system that continuously collects, normalizes, and enriches listings from multiple external sources with a subscription-based daily curated feed. Featuring phone-only authentication, large readable UI elements, and a search, the system is designed to reduce complexity for end users while delivering a reliable, scalable, and continuously updated marketplace, with the frontend located in ./sandbox/easeclassifieds and the backend and aggregation services in ./sandbox/easeclassifieds-api.
